I believe this happened when I pulled down the debug menu before creating any
configs.

I've tried unsuccessfully to duplicate this one, including stepping through the code mentioned 
in the walkback trying to see what might go wrong without luck.  The only thing I can figure is that 
Jared might have run into a problem to do with the crossover from plain String mementos to XML 
mementos.  Darin, how long ago did this happen?

Marking this as WORKSFORME.  I haven't been able to reproduce, and I think the odds are high this was 
a result of the transition of the config memento format.
